subject: Mountains
Mountain Climbing
Cancer
lead_paragraph: Even if Kevin Mahoney does not reach the summit of an unclimbed mountain in Alaska, he will still achieve his goal: helping raise awareness about cancer, which recently claimed the life of his mother.
snippet: Even if Kevin Mahoney does not reach the summit of an unclimbed mountain in Alaska, he will still achieve his goal: helping raise awareness about cancer, which recently claimed the life of his mother.
